description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Farthest North. Being the record of a voyage of exploration of the ship “Fram,” 1893-96, and of a fifteen months' sleigh journey by Dr. Nansen and Lieut. Johansen ... With an appendix by Otto Sverdrup, etc. [With plates, including portraits.]" Author: Nansen, Fridtjof Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010460.l.10." Volume: 01 Page: 611 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1897 Publisher: Harper & Bros. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002603734 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
